article_node.title: How to bypass UK porn sites age verification in 2025
article_node.summary: The article discusses the importance of using a VPN for watching porn anonymously, highlighting that incognito mode does not provide sufficient privacy. It recommends NordVPN as the best option due to its extensive server network, strong encryption, and no-logs policy, allowing users to bypass age verification laws and access adult content securely. Other suggested tips include using malware protection, avoiding account creation on porn sites, and utilizing VPN browser extensions to enhance anonymity. The article also briefly mentions free VPNs, cautioning that while some are safe, they often lack essential features compared to premium services.
